thread.title: Soap spoilers: EastEnders kiss, Coronation Street concern, Emmerdale scare, Hollyoaks suspicion - EastEnders Soaps -
thread.title_full: Soap spoilers: EastEnders kiss, Coronation Street concern, Emmerdale scare, Hollyoaks suspicion - EastEnders News - Soaps - Digital Spy

author: Daniel Kilkelly
title: Soap spoilers: EastEnders kiss, Coronation Street concern, Emmerdale scare, Hollyoaks suspicion - EastEnders Soaps -
text: Donna Yates and Fatboy Chubb get passionate on EastEnders later this month, but she could be setting herself up for disappointment. The pair have grown closer in recent months, but it's clear that Donna (Lisa Hammond) has more than friendship on her mind as she starts to consider the prospect of a relationship with Fatboy.As Donna continues to flirt with Fatboy (Ricky Norwood), the pair finally share a kiss back at her flat. With the tension rising, Donna then finds herself leading him to the bedroom. © BBCDonna flirts with Fatboy © BBCDonna and Fatboy kiss However, as news about Fatboy and Donna spreads around the Square, it quickly becomes apparent that they have different ideas about what happens next.While Donna opens up to Nancy Carter about her past relationship experiences, an unsure Fatboy admits to Tamwar Masood that Donna is just a friend.After some encouragement from Tamwar, Fatboy eventually asks her out for a drink, but is this what he really wants or could there be heartbreak in store for Donna?EastEnders airs these scenes on Tuesday, October 13 at 7.30pm on BBC One.EastEnders star Lisa Hammond: 'You'll find out more about Donna'Read more EastEnders spoilers and newsOver on Coronation Street, Sarah Platt finds a possible confidant as she continues to struggle following Callum Logan's death.Sarah (Tina O'Brien) has found it very difficult to carry on as normal after helping Kylie and David to cover up Callum's grisly demise.Things come to a head for the Rovers barmaid later this month when Tony Stewart and the Grimshaws start asking her questions about why Callum hasn't been around recently.Billy Mayhew (Daniel Brocklebank) is concerned when he later spots Sarah snapping at Todd, so he decides to step in and check whether she's okay.Billy assures Sarah that as a vicar, anything she tells him would be in the strictest of confidence. Feeling reassured by this, Sarah starts to open up by revealing that her boyfriend threatened her and things got out of hand. Will she go on to share the whole terrible tale with Billy? © ITVSarah confides in Billy Coronation Street airs these scenes on Friday, October 16 at 7.30pm and 8.30pm on ITV.Coronation Street spoilers: Sarah Platt visits the police over CallumCoronation Street's Jack P Shepherd goes undercover to ask public about live episodeRead more Coronation Street spoilers and newsComing up on Emmerdale, Jai Sharma suffers a health scare as his recent drug use finally catches up with him.Jai (Chris Bisson) is feeling smugger than ever, until some frightening symptoms suddenly wipe the smile off his face.The trouble unfolds when Jai takes more cocaine just before a meeting with an important buyer at the factory.Kirin Kotecha (Adam Fielding) is shocked and concerned when he catches Jai in the act, but his worry turns to admiration when he sees how Jai manages to hold the buyer in the palm of his hand.Jai tries to tempt Kirin into following in his footsteps when he offers him some cocaine, promising that it will make him feel unstoppable. Taken in by Jai's claims, Kirin agrees and soon makes a confident pitch of his own to the buyer.The pair go out to celebrate following their successful day, but the mood soon changes when Jai suddenly doubles over in agony with blood running from his nose.Panicking over Jai's condition, can Kirin get him the help he needs without exposing their drugs shame? © ITVJai suddenly feels unwell © ITVKirin notices something isn't right with Jai © ITVJai is in agony © ITVCan Kirin get help for Jai? Emmerdale airs these scenes on Monday, October 12 at 6.45pm on ITV.Emmerdale spoilers: Nikhil Sharma will return to the village as Rik Makarem reprises roleRead more Emmerdale spoilers and newsMeanwhile, Ste Hay's secret Hollyoaks affair could be about to land his estranged husband John Paul McQueen in big trouble.Ste (Kieron Richardson) is currently enjoying a fling with teenager Harry Thompson, who gets a little too eager later this month with a plan to surprise his lover.Harry (Parry Glasspool) decides to give Ste a treat by waiting for him naked at the Lomax house, but he gets much more than he bargained for when Ste walks in with his shocked daughter Leah. © Lime PicturesHarry strips off and waits at Lomax's for Ste © Lime PicturesSte covers Leah's eyes from a naked Harry © Lime PicturesHarry covers his modesty © Lime PicturesSte rushes Leah upstairs Feeling frustrated over their lack of alone time, Harry then takes Ste's credit card and books a hotel room for them under the names of Mr Thompson and Mr McQueen. He does so because Ste still hasn't changed his name back to Hay on his card. When Nancy Osborne (Jessica Fox) spots the booking confirmation on the school computer, she jumps to the wrong conclusion that Harry is dating John Paul.Nancy doesn't waste much time before confronting John Paul (James Sutton), but when he doesn't know anything about it, they both ask Harry for the truth.Harry spins a believable cover story when he claims that he booked the room for him and Cleo, but nosy Nancy later overhears Harry and John Paul talking about their one-off kiss earlier in the year. © Lime PicturesHarry and John Paul discuss their kiss © Lime PicturesNancy overhears Harry and John Paul's conversation Nancy knows that she has to do the right thing by reporting her discovery to Patrick Blake, but will this spark another crisis for John Paul's career?Hollyoaks airs these scenes on Wednesday, October 14 and Thursday, October 15 at 6.30pm on Channel 4.Hollyoaks star Kieron Richardson wants support for Ste and Harry: 'If Danny Miller can do it, so can we'Hollyoaks stars are 'shocked' after discovering the Gloved Hand Killer's identityHollyoaks' Parry Glasspool: 'Fans miss Brendan, they don't like change'Hollyoaks boss Bryan Kirkwood: 'It may not be the end of Ste and John Paul'Ste and Sinead reunite as Stephanie Davis meets up with Hollyoaks co-star Kieron RichardsonHollyoaks spoilers: The Roscoes and Trevor will go to war in the 20th anniversary weekHollyoaks spoilers: John Paul McQueen to seek Christmas reunion with Ste HayRead more Hollyoaks spoilers and newsOver on Doctors, Ayesha Lee decides to stand up to Hayden Connor after discovering that he has secretly drugged her.Ayesha (Laura Rollins) is initially intimidated by Hayden when he warns that nobody will believe her due to her history, but she soon decides that she can't keep quiet.The final straw for Ayesha comes when she finds out that Sid Vere has been out with Hayden (Sean Browne), which leaves her worrying that he could be falling into the same trap as her.Ayesha takes Sid aside and tries to warn him off Hayden, but he takes it the wrong way and tells her to back off. She also confronts Hayden and once again threatens to tell their boss Howard Bellamy the truth, but he continues to claim that she'd live to regret it. © BBCAyesha tries to get tough with Hayden Finally realising this is a risk she'll have to take, Ayesha tells Howard about Hayden's drug issues and confesses that he spiked her – so she may have treated patients while on drugs. Howard has no choice but to suspend Ayesha pending a drug test and suggests she should tell the police as soon as possible. Has Ayesha just landed herself in hot water?Doctors airs these scenes on Monday, October 12 and Tuesday, October 13 at 1.45pm on BBC One.Read more Doctors spoilers and newsCoronation Street was the winner of our storyline poll last week as 35% of you chose Sally's wedding shock as the best plot.Emmerdale took second place with 27% for Aaron wishing Robert dead, while EastEnders was third with 21% for newcomer Jase betraying Elaine.Hollyoaks managed fourth spot with 14% as Zack caught Lisa's eye, while Doctors had the remaining 3% for Hayden threatening Ayesha.Don't forget to vote in our poll below and let us know which storyline looks best this week!Digital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on Ian and Kathy's EastEnders reunion, Sally Webster's Coronation Street wedding shocker, a horror accident in Emmerdale and a fire drama for one Hollyoaks family. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID);
